{"id":571940590,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1634359776,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/571940590/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"6.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int myAtoi(string s) {\n        int sign=1;\n        long int num=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            if(isalpha(s[i])||s[i]=='.'||s[i]==',')\n            {\n                return 0;\n            }\n            if(i<s.length()-1&&s[i]=='-'&&s[i+1]>=48&&s[i+1]<=57)\n            {\n                sign=-1;\n            }\n           \n            if(s[i]>=48&&s[i]<=57)\n            {\n                int k=i;\n                while(s[k]>=48&&s[k]<=57)\n                {\n                    if(num>INT_MAX)\n                        break;\n                    num=num*10+(s[k]-48);\n                    \n                    k++;\n                }\n               \n                num*=sign;\n                if(num<INT_MIN)\n                 num=INT_MIN;\n                if(num>INT_MAX)\n                    num=INT_MAX;\n                return num;\n            }\n             if(i<s.length()-1&&(s[i]=='+'||s[i]=='-')&&s[i+1]<48||s[i+1]>57)\n            {\n                return 0;\n            }\n        }\n        return 0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi"}
